work-item.field:
• Execute i1_SmokeTest_Team B online (change status as previously done to "In Progress") and use recent button to reuse execution details from your previous test run.
  • Execute i1_LoginTest_Team C (change status as previously done to "In Progress") and check if your parameters work as expected. Please let at least 1 iteration of your login screen test fail.
  • Review your test run i1_LoginTest_Team C and check what kind of data is stored in your defect.
    Hint: Test parameters can also be exported for offline execution.
